overview: Two brothers, Carson and Levi are going about their day. Levi calls Carson from the pizza shop he's at and they have a short conversation. When Carson is returning to his car and Levi is enjoying his pizza a sonic booms shakes them. They look up at the sky to see meteors falling down to earth. Carson drives over to Levi to make sure he's okay but crashes into a meteor. He walks with a broken foot screaming out for Levi hoping for a response. Levi calls back and they reunite.
title: Summer's End
